name: Gadge It Project
summary: Learn about .GADGEPRJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: GADGEPRJ files are saved in a .ZIP format and contain all assets for the gadget. An enclosed project.xml file saves the configuration for the button.
NOTE: Ashampoo Gadge It has been discontinued.

description: Project file created by Ashampoo Gadge It, a program used for adding gadgets to the Windows desktop; can be a standalone gadget, a gadget for the Windows sidebar, or a gadget for the user's browser menu; can contain interactive buttons, scripted actions, graphics, and text.
